dict.string: HustleXP needs camera access to take photos for task proof submission and license verification.
HustleXP needs photo library access to select images for task proof and license uploads.
HustleXP needs your location to show nearby tasks, enable live radar, and verify task completion.
HustleXP uses background location to track your progress on active tasks and provide real-time updates to task posters.
HustleXP uses Face ID to securely authenticate payments and sensitive account actions.
